column3:
ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8963/commits/ceb26018221144c57fffc15aa4e8419e821ae446

What about grouping all these missing peer numbers into one PR? ;-)

@paveljanik yes, well, I will do what I mentioned in the TODO at some point, which will also ensure any missing debug lines get caught (I'm not aware of any others though) and allow all peer= lines to show the IP address instead (although how desired this behvaviour would be, I'm not sure).\n
Do you really have to open a pull per debug message, and 8 at a time at that?\nYou're annoying everyone by doing this, just stop it.\n
@laanwj I am sorry, but you close my pull requests when they do too much, and you close them when they do too little. Exactly what is the window in which you are happy?\n
